ippoz.reload.commons.datafetcher.database

Class DatabaseConnector

  • java.lang.Object
    • ippoz.reload.commons.datafetcher.database.DatabaseConnector

  • public class DatabaseConnector
extends java.lang.Object
    The Class DatabaseConnector. Represents a generic database connector that needs to be instantiated depending on the specific database type.
    Author:
    Tommy
